0.title: [stationName] Spring (March to May) Average Precipitation
0.subTitle: March to May
0.caption: Average annual spring (March to May) precipitation. The lowest (min) and highest (max) precipitation of the month. Note the measurement of snow from precipitation is estimated from precipitation taking place when the temperature was simultaneously recorded as below 0 C. These values should be considered estimates and not a precise value.

1.title: [stationName] Spring Average Precipitation Difference from Baseline
1.caption: Difference between the spring (March-May) seasonal averages and the average for the baseline period, typically 1961 to 1990.
